import React, { useState } from 'react' import './FormPart.css' const FormPart = (props) => { const[details,setDetails]=useState({name:'',mail:'',gender:'',status:''}) const[userList,setUserList]=useState([]) const handleOnChange=(data,key)=>{ console.log(data,key) let temp={...details} temp[key]=data setDetails(temp) } const handleOnSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() console.log("submitted") if(details.name && details.mail && details.gender && details.status){ if(window.confirm("are you sure to add ?")){ const tempObj={ name:details.name, mail:details.mail, gender:details.gender, status:details.status } let tempList=[...userList] tempList.push(tempObj) setUserList(tempList) details.name='' details.mail='' details.gender='' details.status='' console.log(tempList) console.log(tempList.length) props.dataHolder(tempList.length) } }else{ alert("Please fill all details") } } const handleDelete=(name)=>{ if(window.confirm("Are you sure want to delete?")){ const newUserList=userList.filter((ele)=>{ return ele.name!==name }) setUserList(newUserList) console.log(newUserList.length) props.dataHolder(newUserList.length) } } // fetching fetch("https://gorest.co.in/public/v2/users") .then((response)=> response.json()) .then((datap)=>console.log(datap)) return (
